page.title: 20ATTITUDES IN MAWNAN
page.content: Mawnan is not a typical Cornish village as it has a large proportion of retired people from other regions. The young people often have to leave to find work and cheaper housing as local prices are inflated due to the holiday trade. However the village has a strong community spirit with a great feeling of local pride in both the way of life and the outstanding natural beauty of the area. The future of the village lies with the children of{Mawnan Smith Primary School.The survey has provided a valuable means of assessing their community and their future in it. {Acknowledgements. The children of Mawnan Smith School and their teachers J. Vipond and L. Dunstan. The villagers of Mawnan Smith. (Mawnan Smith School 1985)
